title: INtopBackup

items.title: The U.S. is a major importer of Indian products made from Russian oil
items.description: The United States imports oil products from India's Reliance Industries refinery, which sources nearly half its oil from Russia.

items.title: How brightly colored do we want our food? For brands, it's a hill to dye on
items.description: Sam's Club is among the food makers removing artificial dyes from products, yet hoping shoppers don't notice a difference in color. But why?

items.title: Harrowing details emerge after surfer killed by shark off popular beach
items.description: The surfer, who had a wife and young daughter, lost "a number of limbs" and his surfboard was broken in two, police said.
